mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.created_at createdAt , B.nm writer, B.main_pic writerMainPic FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser ORDER BY iboard DESC LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${row}
SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.ctnt, B.nm, B.main_pic mainPic, A.created_at createdAt,A.updated_at updatedAt FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE iboard = #{iboard}
mapper.update: update t_board set title = #{title}, ctnt = #{ctnt}, updated_at = now() where iboard = #{iboard} and iuser = #{iuser}
